1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah said:"Whoever narrated to you that the Prophet would urinate while standing; then do not believe him. He would not urinate except while squatting." [He said:] There are narrations on this topic from Umar, Buraidah, [and Abdur-Rahman bin Hasanah]

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي النَّهْىِ عَنِ الْبَوْلِ، قَائِمًا
chapter.eng-name: (What Has Been Related About) The Prohibition Of Urinating While Standing
